TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlCachePolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 ASP.NET 用户控件的输出缓存设置的编程访问。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to an ASP.NET user control's output cache settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编程式用户控制方案中的开发人员使用类来指定用户控件 （.ascx 文件） 的输出缓存设置。The class is used by developers in programmatic user control scenarios to specify output caching settings for user controls (.ascx files). ASP.NET 将嵌入的用户控件实例。ASP.NET embeds user controls within a instance. 类表示启用了输出缓存的用户控件。The class represents a user control that has output caching enabled. 当访问的属性控件，你始终将收到一个有效对象。When you access the property of a control, you will always receive a valid object. 但是，如果访问的属性控件，您接收到有效对象只能由已在包装用户控件控件。However, if you access the property of a control, you receive a valid object only if the user control is already wrapped by a control. 如果不换行，属性返回的对象将引发异常，当您尝试对其进行操作，因为它不具有关联。If it is not wrapped, the object returned by the property will throw exceptions when you attempt to manipulate it because it does not have an associated . 若要确定是否实例支持缓存不会生成异常，检查属性。To determine whether a instance supports caching without generating exceptions, inspect the property. 使用类是可启用输出缓存的几种方式之一。Using the class is one of several ways you can enable output caching. 以下列表介绍了可用于启用输出缓存的方法：The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching: - 使用指令启用输出缓存在声明性方案中。Use the directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios. - 使用特性，使用户控件代码隐藏文件中的缓存。Use the attribute to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file. - 使用类，以指定在其中你正在使用的编程方案中的缓存设置已启用缓存的使用上一方法之一，并使用动态加载的实例方法。Use the class to specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with instances that have been cache-enabled using one of the previous methods and dynamically loaded using the method. 一个实例才能成功操作仅介于`Init`和`PreRender`控件生命周期的阶段。A instance can be successfully manipulated only between the `Init` and `PreRender` stages of the control life cycle. 如果你修改对象之后`PreRender`阶段中，ASP.NET 会引发异常，因为在呈现控件后，进行任何更改不能实际影响缓存设置 (在过程缓存控件`Render`阶段)。If you modify a object after the `PreRender` phase, ASP.NET throws an exception, because any changes made after the control is rendered cannot actually affect cache settings (a control is cached during the `Render` stage). 最后，用户控件实例 (因此其对象) 实际上呈现时才可用于以编程方式操作。Finally, a user control instance (and therefore its object) is only available for programmatic manipulation when it is actually rendered. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态加载和运行时以编程方式操作用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 特性应用于名为的用户控件`SimpleControl`，这意味着该用户控件由包装控件在运行时。The attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a control at run time. `SimpleControl`对象的缓存设置可以以编程方式通过及其关联操作对象，可通过引用包装它的控件。The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the control that wraps it. 在此示例中，属性检查在页初始化和更改使用期间和方法满足某些条件时。In this example, the property is examined during page initialization and changed using the and methods if some conditions are met. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/Default2.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/Default2.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用`SimpleControl`从 Web 窗体页的用户控件。The following code example demonstrates using the `SimpleControl` user control from a Web Forms page. 若要成功运行此示例，请确保用户控件文件 (.ascx)、 其代码隐藏文件 （.cs 或.vb） 和承载用户控件 (.aspx) 的 Web 窗体页是相同的目录中。To run this example successfully, make sure the user control file (.ascx), its code-behind file (.cs or .vb), and the Web Forms page that hosts the user control (.aspx) are in the same directory. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/SimpleControl.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/SimpleControl.ascx.vb#2)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/SimpleControl.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/SimpleControl.ascx#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与缓存的用户控件输出关联的 类的实例。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of the class associated with the cached user control output.
The associated with the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性委托给属性的包装用户控件的控件。The property delegates to the property of the control that wraps the user control. 当实例无效，从缓存中删除的用户控件。When the instance is invalidated, the user control is removed from the cache.

exception.span: 用户控件与 没有关联，因此不可缓存。

span.span: The user control is not associated with a and is not cacheable.
\- or -

span.span: The property is set outside of the initialization and rendering stages of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存的项将在输出缓存中保留的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that cached items are to remain in the output cache.

value.span: ，表示用户控件将在输出缓存中保留的时间。

span.span: A that represents the amount of time a user control is to remain in the output cache.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用设置的绝对过期策略方法，属性返回的缓存项过期前的剩余时间量。If an absolute expiration policy is set using the method, the property returns the amount of time remaining until cache entry expiration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态加载和运行时以编程方式操作用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 特性应用于名为的用户控件`SimpleControl`，这意味着它由包装控件在运行时。The attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means it is wrapped by a control at run time. `SimpleControl`对象的缓存设置可以以编程方式通过及其关联操作对象，可通过引用包装它的控件。The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the control that wraps it. 在此示例中，属性在页面初始化过程将检查并满足某些条件时更改了缓存过期日期。In this example, the property is examined during page initialization and cache expiration is changed if some conditions are met. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/Default2.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/Default2.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与控件实例关联的输出缓存提供程序的名称，。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the output-cache provider that is associated with a control instance.
The name of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于指定当前输出缓存提供程序通过使用与控件关联的实例。The property enables you to specify the current output-cache provider that is associated with a control, by using the instance. 仅之前设置此属性控件生命周期中发生的事件。This property can be set only before the event occurs in the control life cycle.

span.span: The provider name was not found.

exception.span: 尝试在 事件期间或之后设置 属性。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property during or after the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetExpires(valuetype System.DateTime expirationTime) cil managed

span.span: A after which the cached entry expires.

summary.span: 指示包装用户控件的 控件在指定的日期和时间使缓存项过期。

span.span: Instructs the control that wraps the user control to expire the cache entry at the specified date and time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用并方法 (传递`true`) 以指示包装要使用可调到期缓存而不是绝对过期策略的策略的用户控件的控件。Use the and methods (passing `true`) to instruct the control that wraps the user control to use a sliding expiration caching policy instead of an absolute expiration policy. 使用方法和方法 (传递`false`) 来指定绝对过期策略。Use the method and the method (passing `false`) to specify an absolute expiration policy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态加载和运行时以编程方式操作用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 特性应用于名为的用户控件`SimpleControl`，这意味着该用户控件由包装控件在运行时。The attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a control at run time. `SimpleControl`对象的缓存设置可以以编程方式通过及其关联操作对象，可通过引用包装它的控件。The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the control that wraps it. 在此示例中，属性检查在页初始化和更改使用期间和方法满足某些条件时。In this example, the property is examined during page initialization and changed using the and methods if some conditions are met. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/Default2.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/Default2.aspx#1)]

param.name: useSlidingExpiration
param.span: 如果使用可调缓存过期而不是绝对过期，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use sliding cache expiration instead of absolute expiration; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指示包装用户控件的 控件将用户控件的缓存项设置为使用可调或绝对过期。

span.span: Instructs the control that wraps the user control to set the user control's cache entry to use sliding or absolute expiration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用并方法 (传递`true`) 以指示包装要使用可调到期缓存而不是绝对过期策略的策略的用户控件的控件。Use the and methods (passing `true`) to instruct the control that wraps the user control to use a sliding expiration caching policy instead of an absolute expiration policy. 使用方法和方法 (传递`false`) 来指定绝对过期策略。Use the method and the method (passing `false`) to specify an absolute expiration policy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态加载和运行时以编程方式操作用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 名为的用户控件`SimpleControl`用修饰属性，这意味着它由包装控件在运行时。A user control named `SimpleControl` is decorated with a attribute, which means it is wrapped by a control at run time. `SimpleControl`对象的缓存设置可以以编程方式通过及其关联操作对象，可通过引用包装它的控件。The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the control that wraps it. 在此示例中，缓存设置来在页面初始化过程检查和更改满足某些条件时。In this example, caching settings are examined during page initialization and changed if some conditions are met. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/Default2.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/Default2.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetVaryByCustom(string varyByCustom) cil managed

span.span: The list of custom strings.

summary.span: 设置要由输出缓存用来改变用户控件的自定义字符串列表。

span.span: Sets a list of custom strings that the output cache will use to vary the user control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将"浏览器"作为传递`varyByCustom`参数，将不同的用户控件是否可以通过浏览器类型和主要版本号。If you pass "browser" as the `varyByCustom` parameter, the user control will be varied by browser type and major version number. 如果输入另一个自定义字符串，则必须重写应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中的方法。If another custom string is entered, you must override the method in your application's Global.asax file.

exception.span: 用户控件与 没有关联，因此不可缓存。

span.span: The user control is not associated with a and is not cacheable.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportsCaching As Boolean
public: property bool SupportsCaching { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示用户控件是否支持缓存。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user control supports caching.

value.span: 如果用户控件支持缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user control supports caching; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户控件支持缓存如果与相关联实例，向发出信号的指令已分析 ASP.NET 分析器或用户控件使用修饰属性。A user control supports caching if it is associated with a instance, which signals that either an directive was parsed by the ASP.NET parser or the user control was decorated with a attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByControl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByControl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要用来改变缓存输出的控件标识符列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of control identifiers to vary the cached output by.

value.span: 分号分隔的字符串列表，用于改变用户控件的输出缓存。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary a user control's output cache.

value.span: 这些字符串表示在用户控件中声明的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的 属性值。

span.span: These strings represent the property values of ASP.NET server controls declared in the user control.

exception.span: 用户控件与 没有关联，因此不可缓存。

span.span: The user control is not associated with a and is not cacheable.
\- or -

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByParams As HttpCacheVaryByParams
public: property System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ VaryByParams { System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要用来改变缓存输出的 或 参数名称列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of or parameter names to vary the cached output by.

value.span: 分号分隔的字符串列表，用于使输出缓存发生变化。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary the output cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，这些字符串对应于与 GET 方法一起发送的查询字符串值或使用 POST 方法发送的参数。By default, these strings correspond to a query string value sent with the GET method or to a parameter sent using the POST method. 当属性设置为多个参数，输出缓存包含请求的文档的不同版本，为每个指定的参数。When the property is set to multiple parameters, the output cache contains a different version of the requested document for each specified parameter. 可能的值包括“none”、“\*”以及任何有效的查询字符串或 POST 参数名。Possible values include "none", "\*", and any valid query string or POST parameter name.

exception.span: 用户控件与 没有关联，因此不可缓存。

span.span: The user control is not associated with a and is not cacheable.
